text: Miriam Yeung New and Best Selections () is Cantopop artist Miriam Yeung's () eighth Compilation album. It was released by her former label, Gold Label Records, on 5 October 2010. The package includes 2 CDs that includes twenty- four Miriam's greatest hits during her time under Gold Label (2004–2006) and 4 never revealed songs.Yeasia – Miriam Yeung New and Best Selections album info. Retrieved 4 April 2011 The package also include a Karaoke DVD. ==Track listing== Bold are new songs. ===CD1=== # 偷生 (Live With No Dignity) # 童話 (Fairytale) # 烈女 (Fierce Lady) # 滾 – 梁漢文+楊千嬅 (Get Off) # 煉金術 (Alchemy) # 長信不如短訊 (Short Message Is Better Than Long Letter) # 情歌 (Love Song) # 我的醉愛 (Love Drunk) # 花與愛麗斯 (Hana and Alice) # 水月鏡花 (Gorgeous Sight) # 郎來了(Wolf Is Coming) # 真愛開玩笑 (True Love Makes Fun) # 大城大事 (Small City Big Matter – Music performed by Twelve Girls Band) # 小星星 (Little Stars) ===CD2=== # 小城大事 (Small City Big Matter) # 你把我灌醉 (You Get Me Drunk) # 處處吻 (Kissing Everywhere) # 大傻 (Naive) # 我的生存之道 (The Way I Live My Life) # 花灑 (Shower) # 流星雨 (Meteor Rain) # 簡愛 (Simple Love) # 柳媚花嬌 (Flowery) # 芬梨道上 (On Findlay Road) # 長恨哥哥 (Hate You, Brother) # 超齡 (Over-age) # 自由行 (Individual Visit) # 你是如此難以忘記 (Hard To Forget You) ==Music videos== # 小城大事(Small City Big Matter) # 烈女 (Fierce Lady) # 大傻 (Naive) # 滾 (Get Off) # 處處吻 (Kissing Everywhere) # 長信不如短訊 (Short Message Is Better Than Long Letter) # 簡愛 (Simple Love) # 郎來了 (Wolf Is Coming) # 我的生存之道 (The Way I Live My Life) # 長恨哥哥 (Hate You, Brother) ==References== Category:2010 compilation albums Category:Cantopop compilation albums Category:Miriam Yeung albums
title: Miriam Yeung New and Best Selections
